name: T - Sonia

_source: multi_add_portrait;Emma;Right;Sonia;Left
speak;Emma;Hey, Sonia!
speak;Sonia; Hey, kiddo!{w} How do you like the world outside the village?
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; I love it!
speak;Emma; Seeing so many cool landscapes along the way and meeting new people{tgm}...{tgm}{w} It's all just so exciting!
expression;Emma;NoSmile
speak;Emma; It's just{tgm}...{tgm}difficult to see all the suffering too.
speak;Sonia; Yeah{tgm}...{tgm} The world isn't all sunshine.{w} There's good and bad people who will do whatever they want if nobody stops them.
speak;Emma; Mom said some people are just that way, and that you can't change them.

speak;Sonia; Caroline's always been a bit of a cynic, but she's partially right.{w} You really can't change people's ways if they aren't willing to change.{w} It's like talking to a brick wall instead of a person{tgm}...{tgm}like Marica.

speak;Emma; I get that people will always steal, kill, anything to get the way they want, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I just don't get why they can't ask for what they want and sort it out that way.{w} Then they wouldn't need to hurt each other.

speak;Sonia; I wish the world could be that simple, kid,{w} but it's been a messed up, broken place for so long,{w} you'd have to set your sights on changing the entire human race.{w} I find that handling it person-by-person is better.{w} And, luckily for you,{w} I'm with you girls all the way to protect you and help you make good choices.
speak;Emma; I appreciate it, Sonia!{w} We all do.{w} You're my first friend I really made, and still my best one.{w} Consider your back covered by me, too.

speak;Sonia; I appreciate it kid, though I'm sure Caroline already has it covered.{w} Why, I remember the time you snuck up on my during one of my patrols,{w} jumped out at me from a bush, and tried to hit me with a stick.{w} Caroline thought you were a rabid beast!{w} After we made sure that her kick didn't hurt you too badly,{w} we all played around pretending to be swordsmasters.
speak;Emma; I remember that very well{tgm}...{tgm} and so does my spleen.{w} Mom was so mad that I interrupted your jobs.
speak;Sonia; Haha, that's true.{w} She was so enraged, I had to spend an hour talking her down.
speak;Emma; It's a wonder she let me off without any punishment.{w} I thought she was gonna make me run laps around town while carrying her.
speak;Sonia; Heh, you're a lucky kid, Emma.{w} Hey, I'm going to take a nap before dinner.{w} I'm starving and exhausted from all the traveling.
speak;Emma; Alright, I hope you can catch some sleep!
speak;Sonia; That makes two of us.{w} Don't get into any trouble I wouldn't cause.{w} I'll see you later.
speak;Emma; Have a good nap!
